channel.title: 317┴Fallout-Pkz┴317
channel.description:
Hey guys, this is a new server I've been working on for a while, btw, if anything seems like advertising, it's not, because the server isn't out yet.
[20:08] yeh I aprove
Working Jad - 100% I've got Jad working 100%. I didn't think waves were neccesary though. Healers do come out and actualy heal Jad when he's running low on hp. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/Jad.jpg[/img] Working Barrows - 80% Barrows is almost done, but when you dig into any of the tombs, all the brothers run after you, and if you try to climb back up, you dc. Perfect Pking - 75% I've still got to tone weapons up/down. Some are too overpowered, while some are too underpowered. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/Pking.jpg[/img] Bosses and Mini-games - 80% I've still got to work on drops, and drop rates for the bosses. KBD drops Dragon Plates about every other kill. With General Graardor, he doesn't drop enough. I also need figure out why even 1 person on Pest Control, laggs the server completely. I also hope to add PK points soon Range - 70% For some odd reason, the source I'm using doesn't like range. By that I meen, the origanal owner made the max hit for any kind of bolt, arrow, knife, throwing axe, javalin, you name it, only hits up to a 19. Atm, I'm working on tuning those up a bit. Specials - 95% Almost all specials work, exept for a few. I've still got to add a Dark Bow special, and a Dragon Mace spec. Other than that, I think I'll be done with specials. Clan Chat - 90% It took forever, but I finally got clan chat to work. Only problem, it Disconnects when you join a clan. Which meens duping is possible. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/ChatClans.jpg[/img] Forums - 100% Took a couple of hours, but I finished the forums, and I have to say, they look very nice. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/forums.jpg[/img] Chat Box - 100% Not a very hard thing to get. It's at the bottom of the forums. VPS Hoster - 0% Still got to make some money to pay for my VPS. This is my 1st server I've made, so take it easy. Adding more pics soon :)

item.title: 317┴Fallout-Pkz┴317
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“time of rune, post:18, topic:291593”][quote author=reverce link=topic=385328.msg2890753#msg2890753 date=1248891630]
nice
exept

Working Jad - 100%
I’ve got Jad working 100%. I didn’t think waves were neccesary though. Healers do come out and actualy heal Jad when he’s running low on hp. [/quote]
Its unpossible for a rsp to have jad 100% --> and the healers, they are on evry proper delta ,
for the rest
nice job and goodluck.

I ment It was 100% the way I wanted it…

Ya, you stole my name, my server which has been up for 3 months. So Copyright to me.

And I didn’t steal your name. Me and my cousin were thinking up names for the server, and he came up with Fallen-Pkz. Then I said, “How about Fallout-Pkz?”
And, I’ve never seen your server anywere. Don’t make false acusations…

And wtf? I’ve been warned for posting a picture of a cow saying “wuff”?[/quote]

You still have my name, thats not a “False assumption”… lol and i was just kidding, ppl on moparscape take stuff to seriously. But my server once runelocus resets toplist will be on top 3. So, then ull hear of me.

Read full topic

item.title: 317┴Fallout-Pkz┴317
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

Hey guys, this is a new server I’ve been working on for a while, btw, if anything seems like advertising, it’s not, because the server isn’t out yet.

[20:08] yeh I aprove

Working Jad - 100%
I’ve got Jad working 100%. I didn’t think waves were neccesary though. Healers do come out and actualy heal Jad when he’s running low on hp.

Working Barrows - 80%
Barrows is almost done, but when you dig into any of the tombs, all the brothers run after you, and if you try to climb back up, you dc.

Perfect Pking - 75%
I’ve still got to tone weapons up/down. Some are too overpowered, while some are too underpowered.

Bosses and Mini-games - 80%
I’ve still got to work on drops, and drop rates for the bosses. KBD drops Dragon Plates about every other kill. With General Graardor, he doesn’t drop enough. I also need figure out why even 1 person on Pest Control, laggs the server completely. I also hope to add PK points soon

Range - 70%
For some odd reason, the source I’m using doesn’t like range. By that I meen, the origanal owner made the max hit for any kind of bolt, arrow, knife, throwing axe, javalin, you name it, only hits up to a 19. Atm, I’m working on tuning those up a bit.

Specials - 95%
Almost all specials work, exept for a few. I’ve still got to add a Dark Bow special, and a Dragon Mace spec. Other than that, I think I’ll be done with specials.

Clan Chat - 90%
It took forever, but I finally got clan chat to work. Only problem, it Disconnects when you join a clan. Which meens duping is possible.

Forums - 100%
Took a couple of hours, but I finished the forums, and I have to say, they look very nice.

Chat Box - 100%
Not a very hard thing to get. It’s at the bottom of the forums.

VPS Hoster - 0%
Still got to make some money to pay for my VPS.

This is my 1st server I’ve made, so take it easy.
Adding more pics soon

Read full topic
